SELECT wi.WISH_ITEM_ID, w.WISH_ID, w.MEMBER_ID, wi.MAIN_CATE_ID, wi.PRODUCT_ID, p.PRODUCT_NAME, p.PRODUCT_CODE, p.PRODUCT_CONTENT, p.PRODUCT_PRICE, p.SALED_PRICE, p.VIEW_CNT, p.IS_VISIBLE, mc.MAIN_CATE_NM, pi.IMAGE_URL, pi.ALT_TEXT, pi.IS_MAIN FROM WISH_ITEMS wi INNER JOIN WISH w ON wi.WISH_ID = w.WISH_ID INNER JOIN PRODUCTS p ON wi.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID INNER JOIN MAIN_CATEGORIES mc ON wi.MAIN_CATE_ID = mc.MAIN_CATE_ID LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_IMG pi ON p.PRODUCT_ID = pi.PRODUCT_ID AND pi.IS_MAIN = 'Y' WHERE w.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
AND wi.MAIN_CATE_ID = #{category}
AND COALESCE(p.SALED_PRICE, p.PRODUCT_PRICE) <= 1000
AND COALESCE(p.SALED_PRICE, p.PRODUCT_PRICE) BETWEEN 1001 AND 3000
AND COALESCE(p.SALED_PRICE, p.PRODUCT_PRICE) BETWEEN 3001 AND 5000
AND COALESCE(p.SALED_PRICE, p.PRODUCT_PRICE) > 5000
AND p.SALED_PRICE IS NOT NULL AND p.SALED_PRICE < p.PRODUCT_PRICE
AND p.IS_VISIBLE = 'N'
AND p.INPUT_DT >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)
ORDER BY COALESCE(p.SALED_PRICE, p.PRODUCT_PRICE) ASC
ORDER BY COALESCE(p.SALED_PRICE, p.PRODUCT_PRICE) DESC
ORDER BY CASE WHEN p.SALED_PRICE IS NOT NULL AND p.SALED_PRICE < p.PRODUCT_PRICE THEN ((p.PRODUCT_PRICE - p.SALED_PRICE) / p.PRODUCT_PRICE) * 100 ELSE 0 END DESC
ORDER BY p.VIEW_CNT DESC
ORDER BY wi.WISH_ITEM_ID DESC

SELECT wi.MAIN_CATE_ID as category, COUNT(*) as count, mc.MAIN_CATE_NM as categoryName FROM WISH_ITEMS wi INNER JOIN WISH w ON wi.WISH_ID = w.WISH_ID INNER JOIN MAIN_CATEGORIES mc ON wi.MAIN_CATE_ID = mc.MAIN_CATE_ID WHERE w.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} GROUP BY wi.MAIN_CATE_ID, mc.MAIN_CATE_NM ORDER BY wi.MAIN_CATE_ID
